snippet: He may have a high-profile job, but Jacob Lew has a decidedly low profile in his upscale Bronx neighborhood.
abstract: He may have a high-profile job, but Jacob Lew has a decidedly low profile in his upscale Bronx neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: In a corner of New York City that has been home to luminaries at various crossroads in their lives, from a youthful John F. Kennedy to an aging Mark Twain, Jacob J. Lew will perhaps not be remembered for his time in Riverdale.

headline.main: Obama's New Chief of Staff Is Little Known Among Bronx Neighbors
